name: Hunter's Bow I
description: Low price, entry-level Bow for hunters. Sold in a set with arrows and a quiver.

name: Wild Bow I
description: Easy to use Bow made from durable Congalala materials. Lovely accents.

name: Blango Fur Bow I
description: Made from Blango. Contains traces of ice inside, making it incredibly cold.

name: Kut-Ku Stave I
description: Fire breathing hunting Bow /made from Yian Kut-Ku. Said to be user friendly.

name: Hunter's Bow III
description: Low price, entry-level Bow for hunters. Sold in a set with arrows and a quiver.

name: Daimyo's Warbow I
description: Unique Bow that resembles a Daimyo Hermitaur. Capable of sharp attacks.

name: Sonic Bow I
description: A surprisingly light thunder Bow made from Hornetaur. Capable of raining arrows.

name: Hunter's Power BowI
description: By using Basarios rock-like materials, users are well equipped for self-defense.

name: Wild Bow III
description: Easy to use Bow made from durable Congalala materials. Lovely accents.

name: Blango Fur Bow III
description: Made from Blangonga. With traces of ice inside, it is incredibly cold.

name: Blue Blade Bow I
description: Acutely angled Bow. Letting loose some non-elemental shafts is easy with this.

name: Queen Blaster I
description: Reliable deep green hunting Bow made from Rathian Shell. Can boost Poison effect.

name: Prominence Bow I
description: This marvel of technology can slice through shell and tear through flesh.

name: Tiger Arrow I
description: Dreadful Bow made from sharp, yet flexible Tigrex materials. Overwhelming.

name: Defect Swordfish Bow
description: Swordfish leftovers-turned-weapon, the ultimate eco-friendly Bow. Paralysis Add.

name: Dragon Bow Halo
description: Mysterious thunder Bow made of Dragonwood. Its crafting survives in oral histories.

name: Dragon Bow Earth
description: Uses the core of a Lao-Shan horn. Drawing it is a matter of the soul, not power.

name: Black Bow I
description: Darker than a bottomless pit, prey cannot escape the arrows this Bow fires.

name: Wild Power Bow I
description: Boasts great power. It can only be drawn by those with sufficient strength.

name: Wing Bow I
description: The Hypnocatrice wings add Sleep Add ability, knocking prey out like a light.

name: Daimyo's Warbow IV
description: Unique Bow that resembles a Daimyo Hermitaur. Capable of sharp attacks.

name: Sonic Bow III
description: A surprisingly light thunder Bow made from Hornetaur. Capable of raining arrows.

name: Queen Blaster III
description: Reliable deep green hunting Bow made from Rathian Shell. Can boost Poison effect.

name: Diablos Horn Bow I
description: Crafted from twisted horns. Mastery allows for fine adjustments in aiming.

name: Tigrex Whisker
description: Made of Tigrex materials, this Bow's practicality allows it to spread death.

name: Blue Kut-Ku Stave I
description: Shining fire Bow that unabashedly makes the most of Blue Kut-Ku materials.

name: Heartshot Bow I
description: Beautiful hunting Bow made from Pink Rathian shell with equally beautiful ability.

name: Hidden Bow
description: Jet-black Bow. The Nargacuga fur absorbs all light making it best for shadowy hunts.

name: Courageous Hope
description: A Bow only used by those who have defeated a fire dragon, also known as heroes.

name: Dragonhead Harp I
description: A harp that affords divine protection. Used by Wyverian minstrels for protection.

name: Akantor Bow
description: Encapsulates the might of -Akantor. Its radiance is only surpassed by its power.

name: Exterminator Bow I
description: Black Bow with an evil dragon's power. One draw of the bow is cause for chaos.

name: Glorious Victory I
description: White Bow said to hold the soul of an ancient dragon. Cleanses away the darkness.

name: Icicle Bow I
description: Made through the sub-zero fusion of Ice Crystals. Unleash a Scatter snowstorm.

name: Jungle Bow I
description: Variation on a powerful Bow. Its heavy draw weight is good for a show of strength.

name: Wolf Bow
description: Garuga-based Bow. Good for small monster melee. High attack power Poison Add.

name: Wing Bow III
description: The Hypnocatrice wings add Sleep Add ability, knocking prey out like a light.

name: Grt Purple Emperor I
description: Water-elemental giant pincer Bow. The large purple frame mirrors a butterfly's wing.

name: Blue Blade Bow III
description: Acutely angled Bow. Letting loose some non-elemental shafts is easy with this.

name: Khezu Bow I
description: The voltage difference between the Bow's states gives arrows a Thunder edge.

name: Prominence Bow IV
description: This marvel of technology can slice through shell and tear through flesh.

name: Gale Horn Bow
description: Powerful Bow made from Black Diablos horn. One pull, and you'll sing its praises too.

name: dummy (Diasorute Arrow)
description: dummy.
